title: Mass Effect 2 DLC Pack by Mass Effect PL Group
description:
== Description ==
DLCs expand the game by adding a new content. This includes more storytelling, new missions, squad members, weapons, armor sets and many more. Unfortunatelly, BioWare didn't think the thing through, so players stumbled upon some problems:
- 23 separate installers to run one by one
- some DLCs not compatible with some language versions of the game
- no option to change language
Well not anymore. Now all you have to do, is to choose from the list, what you want to install and let installer work. It will install chosen DLCs, add missing translations, allow to change language and install newest patch.

== Install info ==
1. Mount an image (or burn it on disc)
2. Run it (Setup.exe)
3. Choose desired options
4. Let installer finish the job

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
